alert.note: Alert for Yakima Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 17 at 5:35PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Yakima County through 600 PM PDT... At 535 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over eastern Yakama Reservation, or 13 miles west of Sunnyside, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sunnyside, Toppenish, Granger and Zillah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
